Articles.Content:
Another attempt to avoid doing anything constructive with my day. Enjoy! (Headphone warning, might get loud)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/7LZtNpxYQqI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

(Of course I know that thing won't make orbit drinking li/ox so soon.. shhhh, it's a movie! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) )
To answer the question at the end of that: NEVER!!! That's jeb's domain!

Ohh yeaaaahhhh!

Needs to be longer is all I'm saying. With more of Mr Loggins' finest on the way up to orbit! 

(and if it's too loud - you're too old.)

Yeah, it needs to be a lot longer. I had tried to add in some shots of a cool barrel roll from both inside and outside the cockpit. I just couldn't make it look right. Even using the camera mod to manage the roll, it just looked kind of weird. The whole project kind of stalled when I discovered that Blender craft file importer script (now addon). It is my new obsession ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif) Maybe sometime soon I can do a major rework using Blender to animate extra scenes into it.
